thread.title: Germania colloca 1,273 mld Bund 30 anni, rendimento medio 1,33% Bond |

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Germania colloca 1,273 mld Bund 30 anni, rendimento medio 1,33% Bond |
text: Feb 14 (Reuters) - Germany's Finance Agency, the federal government's debt management office, sold 1.273 billion euros in a top up of its 2.50 percent, 30-year Bund at the lowest price of 125.92, the Bundesbank said on Wednesday. The notes (ISIN:DE0001135481) are due to mature on July 04, 2044. The settlement date is Feb 16. Results of Jan 17 sale included for reference: AUCTION DATE 14/02/18 17/01/18 AVG. YIELD 1.33 pct 1.28 pct AVG. ACCEPTED PRICE 125.93 99.2 LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 125.92 99.17 TAIL 0.01 0.03 TOTAL BIDS 1.939 bln euros 1.724 bln euros ALLOTTED 1.273 bln euros 1.261 bln euros RETAINED 0.227 bln euros 0.239 bln euros BID COVER RATIO 1.5 1.4 TOTAL VOLUME 23.5 bln euros 5.5 bln euros Auction details in German can be found at .
